description:
Ryo and Kaori attempt to protect a female lawyer marked for death by a corrupt developer, after an electronic databook is accidentally left in her possession.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tenka no Ren`ai Genkouhan Bijin Bengoshi o Kudoku Hou
The Greatest Flagrant Love Committed: How to Hit on a Beautiful Lawyer
天下の恋愛現行犯美人弁護士をくどく法
